channel.title: New mini game almsot done need help!
channel.description: ok i am making a mini game and figured otu some of it i jsut need to know how to make it so the entire team gets a reward when they win but i dont know how the main thing is is theres 2 bases theres flag in middle and u have to get the flag and take it to the base whatever team gets it there first wins theres 2 bases and 2 teams so how do i like get it to tell everyone on each team if they won or lost like couldnt i have each player wear a hood on each team each team has a diffrent colar hood and have each team get reward and say if they won or lost i know how to have it say somethign the code is sendquest and i just dont know how to put all codes together its confusing o ye i need to know how to make a respawn point when u die in the area
